home.findHero: Find someone who wants to help you!

help.title: Help
help.1stParagraph: It's principles are extremely simple. You enter your street on the main page and check where the person ready to help is closest to you. The phone number or e-mail address you provide makes contact with her simple. You will immediately see a list of things you can get support for.
help.1stParagraphBold: Neighbour care! It's a unique application that puts the most important goal of taking care of you and your immediate surroundings.
help.2ndParagraphBold: This is a perfect application, for a difficult time of quarantine, but also for everyday life. After all, neighborhood friendliness is at stake every day.
help.cleaningPoint: Doing the shopping and bringing it home to the old man
help.careOfBabyPoint: Taking care of the baby when you need to get something done quickly
help.takingDogPoint: Taking your dog out for a walk when you can't do it yourself
help.pickingUpPoint: Picking up the package in the neighborhood
help.drivingUpPoint: Driving up for something, or dropping you off if you don't have a car
help.careOfPetPoint: Taking care of your pet when you have to leave
help.lessonsPoint: Conducting online lessons that will help you understand a difficult issue or make valuable use of your free time.
help.4thParagraph: Just enter your e-mail address. You enter your name, phone number, mark what you are able to do to help the person in your neighborhood and you are ready!
help.4thParagraphBold: The application allows you to easily join an incredible group of helpful people.
help.4thParagraphBold2: It's only two minutes to become a superhero of your community!
help.4thParagraph2: But most importantly, it's up to you to decide what form of contact you'll have and when you can actually act. The application allows you to change your profile audience. Everything is done so that the help you give is real and as optimal as possible.
help.5thParagraph: We can't always do everything by ourselves, but there are always people around us doing similar things!
help.5thParagraphBold: Why not combine those in need of help with those who can give it? This is what Neighbour Care is all about. Let's take care of each other!
help.6thParagraph: If you have any remarks, good, or informative, feel free to contact with us. All the necessary information can be found in the contact section. We are happy to read all the news, we want to create the best space to help each other.

contact.touch: Or you just wanna stay in touch?
